queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:csc_live_search_phrases` ( `phrase_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `company_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `priority` mediumint(5) NOT NULL, `phrase` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL, `product_ids` text NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `status` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A', PRIMARY KEY (`phrase_id`), KEY `phrase_lang_code` (`phrase`,`lang_code`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:csc_live_search_popularity` ( `product_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL, `qid` mediumint(10) NOT NULL, `popularity` int(8) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', UNIQUE KEY `product_id_q_id` (`product_id`,`qid`), KEY `popularity` (`popularity`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:csc_live_search_q_base` ( `qid` mediumint(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `company_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `q` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`qid`), KEY `q_lang_code` (`q`,`lang_code`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:csc_live_search_q_requests` ( `rid` mediumint(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `company_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `qid` mediumint(10) NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) NOT NULL, `user_ip` tinyblob NOT NULL, `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL, `user_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`rid`), UNIQUE KEY `q_id_timestamp` (`qid`,`timestamp`), KEY `lang_code` (`lang_code`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:csc_live_search_stop_words` ( `stop_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `company_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `phrase` varchar(25) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `synonyms` text CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lang_code` char(2) CHARACTER SET utf16 NOT NULL, `status` char(1) CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A', PRIMARY KEY (`stop_id`), KEY `phrase_lang_code` (`phrase`,`lang_code`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:csc_live_search_synonyms` ( `synonym_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `company_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `phrase` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `synonyms` text NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) NOT NULL, `user_id` mediumint(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL, `status` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A', PRIMARY KEY (`synonym_id`), KEY `phrase_lang_code` (`phrase`,`lang_code`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
